expo.name: Covnet
expo.description: Covnet is an anonymously contact tracing system. It informs you if you have been in close contact with a COVID-19 case and show you where the interaction may have occurred. You can view infected locations within 100 meters from where you are and were 2 hours ago.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Covnet needs access to your location so it can notify you if you have been in close contact with a COVID-19 case and show you nearby infected places
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Covnet needs access to your location so it can notify you if you have been in close contact with a COVID-19 case and show you nearby infected places
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Covnet needs access to your location so it can notify you if you have been in close contact with a COVID-19 case and show you nearby infected places
